translation: To the Brahmana who has known the Self, all the Vedas are of as much use as a reservoir of water would be in a place where there is a flood.
commentary: 2.46 Yavan as much? Meaning: use? Udpane in a reservoir? Everywhere everywhere? samplutodake being flooded? so much,so much (use)? in all in all? in the Vedas in the Vedas? of the Brahmana? Vijanata of the knowing.Commentary Only for a sage who has realized the Self? the Vedas are of no use? because he is in possession of the infinite knowledge of the Self. This doesn't? however? mean that the Vedas
